section.p: The software requires a number of settings for setting up the container environment for running . These settings are provided in environment variables in Docker files when deploying the containers. Before the deployment, you needed to adapt the initial settings to your environment, in particular server names, ports, paths, and user IDs.
You do this by editing the following configuration files in the /docker directory:

li.p: .env: Configuration for Docker, such as images and the base data directory

ol.li: var.env: Configuration for , such as mail server, database and other settings.

section.p: There are also configuration settings for the services, timers, marketplaces, etc. that can be set and adjusted using the administration portal.
This appendix describes all settings in detail.
